Class CameraObservedObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.GameObject
      • game.CameraObservedObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Entity, Terrain
    public abstract class CameraObservedObject
extends GameObject
    A GameObject that depends on the game camera.

      • CameraObservedObject

        public CameraObservedObject​(java.awt.Point cameraLocation,
                            double x,
                            double y,
                            double width,
                            double height)
        This constructor creates a reference to the related Scene.cameraLocation.
        Parameters:
        cameraLocation - The scene camera's current location
        x - The x coordinate in absolute space of this Object
        y - The y coordinate in absolute space of this Object
        width - The width of this object, before scaling by Main.SIZE_FACTOR
        height - The width of this object, before scaling by Main.SIZE_FACTOR
